articles.description: To explain the difference between vegan and non-vegan wines, I first need to walk you through the basics of conventional winemaking. So top up your glass and let's begin, writes Geoff Scollary.
articles.content:
Consumer interest in vegan wines is growing, with vegan-friendly wines showing up in many supermarkets and Google searches for "vegan wine" soaring in recent years.
But what makes a vegan-friendly w… [+5500 chars]
